error: parse error at position 44: syntax error

query: CREATE TABLE error_tbl (b1 bool DEFAULT (1 IN (1, 2)))
expected: CREATE TABLE error_tbl (b1 BOOLEAN DEFAULT (1 IN (1, 2)))

query: CREATE TABLE CHECK_TBL (x int, CONSTRAINT CHECK_CON CHECK (x > 3))
expected: CREATE TABLE check_tbl (x INT, CONSTRAINT check_con CHECK (x > 3))

query: CREATE TABLE CHECK2_TBL (x int, y text, z int, CONSTRAINT SEQUENCE_CON CHECK (x > 3 and y <> 'check failed' and z < 8))
expected: CREATE TABLE check2_tbl (x INT, y TEXT, z INT, CONSTRAINT sequence_con CHECK (x > 3 AND y <> 'check failed' AND z < 8))

query: INSERT INTO CHECK2_TBL VALUES (1, 'x check failed', -2)
expected: INSERT INTO check2_tbl VALUES (1, 'x check failed', -2)

query: INSERT INTO CHECK2_TBL VALUES (5, 'z check failed', 10)
expected: INSERT INTO check2_tbl VALUES (5, 'z check failed', 10)

query: CREATE TABLE INSERT_TBL (x INT DEFAULT nextval('insert_seq'), y TEXT DEFAULT '-NULL-', z INT DEFAULT -1 * currval('insert_seq'), CONSTRAINT INSERT_TBL_CON CHECK (x >= 3 AND y <> 'check failed' AND x < 8), CHECK (x + z = 0))
expected: CREATE TABLE insert_tbl (x INT DEFAULT nextval('insert_seq'), y TEXT DEFAULT '-NULL-', z INT DEFAULT -1 * currval('insert_seq'), CONSTRAINT insert_tbl_con CHECK (x >= 3 AND y <> 'check failed' AND x < 8), CHECK (x + z = 0))
INSERT INTO insert_tbl (y, z) VALUES ('check failed', 4)
INSERT INTO insert_tbl (x, y) VALUES (5, 'check failed')
INSERT INTO insert_tbl (x, y) VALUES (5, '!check failed')

query: INSERT INTO INSERT_TBL VALUES (null, null, null)
expected: INSERT INTO insert_tbl VALUES (NULL, NULL, NULL)

query: CREATE TABLE SYS_COL_CHECK_TBL (city text, state text, is_capital bool, altitude int, CHECK (NOT (is_capital AND tableoid::regclass::text = 'sys_col_check_tbl')))
expected: CREATE TABLE sys_col_check_tbl (city TEXT, state TEXT, is_capital BOOLEAN, altitude INT, CHECK (NOT (is_capital AND CAST(CAST(tableoid AS regclass) AS TEXT) = 'sys_col_check_tbl')))
SELECT *, CAST(CAST(tableoid AS regclass) AS TEXT) FROM sys_col_check_tbl

query: CREATE TABLE SYS_COL_CHECK_TBL (city text, state text, is_capital bool, altitude int, CHECK (NOT (is_capital AND ctid::text = 'sys_col_check_tbl')))
expected: CREATE TABLE sys_col_check_tbl (city TEXT, state TEXT, is_capital BOOLEAN, altitude INT, CHECK (NOT (is_capital AND CAST(ctid AS TEXT) = 'sys_col_check_tbl')))

query: CREATE TABLE INSERT_CHILD (cx INT default 42, cy INT CHECK (cy > x)) INHERITS (INSERT_TBL)
expected: CREATE TABLE insert_child (cx INT DEFAULT 42, cy INT CHECK (cy > x)) INHERITS (insert_tbl)
INSERT INTO insert_child (x, z, cy) VALUES (7, -7, 11)
INSERT INTO insert_child (x, z, cy) VALUES (7, -7, 6)
INSERT INTO insert_child (x, z, cy) VALUES (6, -7, 7)
INSERT INTO insert_child (x, y, z, cy) VALUES (6, 'check failed', -6, 7)

query: CREATE TABLE ATACC1 (TEST INT CHECK (TEST > 0) NO INHERIT)
CREATE TABLE ATACC1 (TEST INT, TEST2 INT CHECK (TEST > 0), CHECK (TEST2 > 10) NO INHERIT)
expected: CREATE TABLE atacc1 (test INT, test2 INT CHECK (test > 0), CHECK (test2 > 10) NO INHERIT)

query: CREATE TEMP TABLE tmp (xd INT, yd TEXT, zd INT)
expected: CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE tmp (xd INT, yd TEXT, zd INT)

query: INSERT INTO tmp VALUES (5, '!check failed', null)
expected: INSERT INTO tmp VALUES (5, '!check failed', NULL)

query: INSERT INTO tmp VALUES (null, 'try again', null)
expected: INSERT INTO tmp VALUES (NULL, 'try again', NULL)

query: INSERT INTO INSERT_TBL(y) select yd from tmp
expected: INSERT INTO insert_tbl (y) SELECT yd FROM tmp

query: INSERT INTO INSERT_TBL SELECT * FROM tmp WHERE yd = 'try again'
expected: INSERT INTO insert_tbl (SELECT * FROM tmp WHERE yd = 'try again')

query: INSERT INTO INSERT_TBL(y,z) SELECT yd, -7 FROM tmp WHERE yd = 'try again'
expected: INSERT INTO insert_tbl (y, z) (SELECT yd, -7 FROM tmp WHERE yd = 'try again')

query: INSERT INTO INSERT_TBL(y,z) SELECT yd, -8 FROM tmp WHERE yd = 'try again'
expected: INSERT INTO insert_tbl (y, z) (SELECT yd, -8 FROM tmp WHERE yd = 'try again')

query: UPDATE INSERT_TBL SET x = NULL WHERE x = 5
expected: UPDATE insert_tbl SET x = NULL WHERE x = 5

query: UPDATE INSERT_TBL SET x = 6 WHERE x = 6
expected: UPDATE insert_tbl SET x = 6 WHERE x = 6

query: UPDATE INSERT_TBL SET x = z, z = x
expected: UPDATE insert_tbl SET x = z, z = x

query: CREATE TABLE COPY_TBL (x INT, y TEXT, z INT, CONSTRAINT COPY_CON CHECK (x > 3 AND y <> 'check failed' AND x < 7 ))
expected: CREATE TABLE copy_tbl (x INT, y TEXT, z INT, CONSTRAINT copy_con CHECK (x > 3 AND y <> 'check failed' AND x < 7))

query: CREATE TABLE PRIMARY_TBL (i int PRIMARY KEY, t text)
expected: CREATE TABLE primary_tbl (i INT PRIMARY KEY, t TEXT)

query: CREATE TABLE PRIMARY_TBL (i int, t text, PRIMARY KEY(i,t))
expected: CREATE TABLE primary_tbl (i INT, t TEXT, PRIMARY KEY (i, t))

query: CREATE TABLE UNIQUE_TBL (i int UNIQUE, t text)
expected: CREATE TABLE unique_tbl (i INT UNIQUE, t TEXT)

query: INSERT INTO UNIQUE_TBL VALUES (5, 'five-upsert-insert') ON CONFLICT (i) DO UPDATE SET t = 'five-upsert-update'
expected: INSERT INTO unique_tbl VALUES (5, 'five-upsert-insert') ON CONFLICT (i) DO UPDATE SET t = 'five-upsert-update'

query: INSERT INTO UNIQUE_TBL VALUES (6, 'six-upsert-insert') ON CONFLICT (i) DO UPDATE SET t = 'six-upsert-update'
expected: INSERT INTO unique_tbl VALUES (6, 'six-upsert-insert') ON CONFLICT (i) DO UPDATE SET t = 'six-upsert-update'

query: INSERT INTO UNIQUE_TBL VALUES (1, 'a'), (2, 'b'), (2, 'b') ON CONFLICT (i) DO UPDATE SET t = 'fails'
expected: INSERT INTO unique_tbl VALUES (1, 'a'), (2, 'b'), (2, 'b') ON CONFLICT (i) DO UPDATE SET t = 'fails'

query: CREATE TABLE UNIQUE_TBL (i int UNIQUE NULLS NOT DISTINCT, t text)
expected: CREATE TABLE unique_tbl (i INT UNIQUE, t TEXT)

query: INSERT INTO UNIQUE_TBL (t) VALUES ('eight') ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING
expected: INSERT INTO unique_tbl (t) VALUES ('eight') ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING

query: CREATE TABLE UNIQUE_TBL (i int, t text, UNIQUE(i,t))
expected: CREATE TABLE unique_tbl (i INT, t TEXT, UNIQUE (i, t))

query: CREATE TABLE unique_tbl (i int UNIQUE DEFERRABLE, t text)

query: CREATE TABLE parted_fk_naming ( id bigint NOT NULL default 1, id_abc bigint, CONSTRAINT dummy_constr FOREIGN KEY (id_abc) REFERENCES parted_fk_naming (id), PRIMARY KEY (id) ) PARTITION BY LIST (id)
expected: CREATE TABLE parted_fk_naming (id BIGINT NOT NULL DEFAULT 1, id_abc BIGINT, CONSTRAINT dummy_constr FOREIGN KEY (id_abc) REFERENCES parted_fk_naming(id), PRIMARY KEY (id)) PARTITION BY list (id)

query: CREATE TABLE parted_fk_naming_1 ( id bigint NOT NULL default 1, id_abc bigint, PRIMARY KEY (id), CONSTRAINT dummy_constr CHECK (true) )
expected: CREATE TABLE parted_fk_naming_1 (id BIGINT NOT NULL DEFAULT 1, id_abc BIGINT, PRIMARY KEY (id), CONSTRAINT dummy_constr CHECK (TRUE))

query: CREATE TEMP TABLE tp (a integer, b integer, PRIMARY KEY (a, b), UNIQUE (b, a))

query: ALTER TABLE t ATTACH PARTITION tp FOR VALUES WITH (MODULUS 1, REMAINDER 0)

expected: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX t_b_idx ON t USING btree ( b, a )

ALTER INDEX t_b_idx ATTACH PARTITION tp_b_a_key

ALTER TABLE t DETACH PARTITION tp
CREATE TEMP TABLE t (a integer) PARTITION BY LIST (a)
expected: CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE t (a INT) PARTITION BY list (a)

query: CREATE TEMP TABLE tp (a integer PRIMARY KEY)
expected: CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE tp (a INT PRIMARY KEY)

query: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX t_a_idx ON t (a)
expected: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX t_a_idx ON t USING btree ( a )

query: ALTER TABLE t ATTACH PARTITION tp FOR VALUES IN (1)

CREATE TABLE circles ( c1 CIRCLE, c2 TEXT, EXCLUDE USING gist (c1 WITH &&, (c2::circle) WITH &&) WHERE (circle_center(c1) <> '(0,0)') )
expected: CREATE TABLE circles (c1 circle, c2 TEXT, EXCLUDE USING gist (c1 WITH &&, (CAST(c2 AS circle)) WITH &&) WHERE (circle_center(c1) <> '(0,0)'))

query: INSERT INTO circles VALUES('<(20,20), 10>', '<(0,0), 4>') ON CONFLICT ON CONSTRAINT circles_c1_c2_excl DO NOTHING
expected: INSERT INTO circles VALUES ('<(20,20), 10>', '<(0,0), 4>') ON CONFLICT ON CONSTRAINT circles_c1_c2_excl DO NOTHING

query: INSERT INTO circles VALUES('<(20,20), 10>', '<(0,0), 4>') ON CONFLICT ON CONSTRAINT circles_c1_c2_excl DO UPDATE SET c2 = EXCLUDED.c2
expected: INSERT INTO circles VALUES ('<(20,20), 10>', '<(0,0), 4>') ON CONFLICT ON CONSTRAINT circles_c1_c2_excl DO UPDATE SET c2 = excluded.c2

query: ALTER TABLE circles ADD EXCLUDE USING gist (c1 WITH &&, (c2::circle) WITH &&)
expected: ALTER TABLE circles ADD EXCLUDE USING gist (c1 WITH &&, (CAST(c2 AS circle)) WITH &&)

query: CREATE TABLE deferred_excl ( f1 int, f2 int, CONSTRAINT deferred_excl_con EXCLUDE (f1 WITH =) INITIALLY DEFERRED )
expected: CREATE TABLE deferred_excl (f1 INT, f2 INT, CONSTRAINT deferred_excl_con EXCLUDE USING btree (f1 WITH =))

query: INSERT INTO deferred_excl VALUES(1) ON CONFLICT ON CONSTRAINT deferred_excl_con DO NOTHING
expected: INSERT INTO deferred_excl VALUES (1) ON CONFLICT ON CONSTRAINT deferred_excl_con DO NOTHING

query: DELETE FROM deferred_excl WHERE f1 = 2 AND f2 IS NULL
UPDATE deferred_excl SET f2 = 2 WHERE f1 = 2
ALTER TABLE deferred_excl DROP CONSTRAINT deferred_excl_con
ALTER TABLE deferred_excl ADD EXCLUDE (f1 WITH =)
expected: ALTER TABLE deferred_excl ADD EXCLUDE USING btree (f1 WITH =)

query: CREATE TABLE constraint_comments_tbl (a int CONSTRAINT the_constraint CHECK (a > 0))
expected: CREATE TABLE constraint_comments_tbl (a INT CONSTRAINT the_constraint CHECK (a > 0))

query: CREATE DOMAIN constraint_comments_dom AS int CONSTRAINT the_constraint CHECK (value > 0)
expected: CREATE DOMAIN constraint_comments_dom AS INT CONSTRAINT the_constraint CHECK (value > 0)

query: COMMENT ON CONSTRAINT the_constraint ON constraint_comments_tbl IS 'yes, the comment'
COMMENT ON CONSTRAINT the_constraint ON DOMAIN constraint_comments_dom IS 'yes, another comment'
COMMENT ON CONSTRAINT no_constraint ON constraint_comments_tbl IS 'yes, the comment'
COMMENT ON CONSTRAINT no_constraint ON DOMAIN constraint_comments_dom IS 'yes, another comment'
COMMENT ON CONSTRAINT the_constraint ON no_comments_tbl IS 'bad comment'
COMMENT ON CONSTRAINT the_constraint ON DOMAIN no_comments_dom IS 'another bad comment'
COMMENT ON CONSTRAINT the_constraint ON constraint_comments_tbl IS NULL
COMMENT ON CONSTRAINT the_constraint ON DOMAIN constraint_comments_dom IS NULL
COMMENT ON CONSTRAINT the_constraint ON constraint_comments_tbl IS 'no, the comment'
COMMENT ON CONSTRAINT the_constraint ON DOMAIN constraint_comments_dom IS 'no, another comment'
